BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Permissions required for stateful agentless integrations (#118644) Closes elastic/security-team#11102 Closes elastic/security-team#11104 This allows agentless integrations (via elastic/beats#41446, elastic/kibana#203810) to write to agentless-* indices. Each index is created on-demand by the filebeat client and kibana conditionally extends the API key permissions to allow writing to the index.
